get.description: Lists events by month. The signup section will be null.

put.description:
updates an event. Only uses the meta, if you change the
type it will delete the children.

post.description:
creates a new event.
You do not need to include the sign-up sheets just the meta

get.description: Get a event including signup-sheets and roles.
Lists all encode presets, these are groups of instructions (formats) for the encoder to create the video
Lists all encode formats, these are instructions for the encoder to create the video
Lists all playlists, doesn't include videos inside.

put.description: Update a playlist, video ID's required otherwise it will remove all videos.

post.description: creates a new playlist with optional video ID's.

get.description: Get a playlist including it's children videos.
Lists all series, doesn't include videos inside.
Get a series including it's children videos.
Gets the statistics about the global video library.
Lists all videos, doesn't include files inside.

post.description: creates a new video, requires the file ID/name to find it in CDN.

get.description: Lists all videos, doesn't include files inside. Uses the createdBy user ID.
get.summary: List all videos created by user ID

get.description: Get a playlist including it's children files.
Get a basic user object by JWT token generated by web-auth.
Get a complete user object by JWT token generated by web-auth.
get.summary: Get a full user by token

get.description: Get a basic user object by ID.
Get a complete user object by ID.
get.summary: Get a full user by ID

attendees.description: Used for social, meet and other. This would be a XOR with Signups
